items.sentence: Is there somewhere we can talk privately about this?
Tom did that, even though he didn\'t really need to.
Tom didn\'t even say goodbye to Mary before he left.
French is the only language that I\'m able to speak.
Tom learned about Mary\'s death on the evening news.
I haven\'t gotten any email from Tom in a long time.
I hope Tom didn\'t do what Mary asked him not to do.
Tom is being very careful not to spill any gasoline.
Tom is better at French than most of his classmates.
Tom is in a better position to do that than Mary is.
Tom is likely to ask Mary for permission to do that.
Can you understand what the writer\'s trying to say?
My French isn\'t good enough to explain the problem.
We abandoned the project because of a lack of funds.
Tom wanted to become a professional baseball player.
Tom wanted to become a search-and-rescue specialist.
Tom wanted to get as far away from Mary as he could.
Tom wanted to know how to say "thank you" in French.
Tom wanted to know when Mary was going to come home.
When Tom comes, I\'ll pay the money that I promised.
I don\'t like fish very much and hardly ever eat it.
What\'s your favorite thing to do in your free time?
Tom told his children that Santa Claus wasn\'t real.
You might be the only one here who can speak French.
How do you think humans are going to become extinct?
How has your life changed over the last three years?
How long did you think the picnic was going to last?
I didn\'t feel like getting out of bed this morning.
Tom came into the room, carrying a bunch of flowers.
Tom came out of the house with his hands in the air.
What\'s happening to you has already happened to me.
Tom couldn\'t remember where he\'d put his umbrella.
I don\'t know how many brothers and sisters Tom has.
Tom said he\'d be disappointed if we couldn\'t come.
You should probably tell Tom where to put the tools.
Tom sat on the pier, dangling his feet in the water.
Tom very often makes mistakes when he speaks French.
I wonder whether or not Tom has ever been to Boston.
I have no idea what we\'re supposed to do right now.
I haven\'t yet bought all the textbooks that I need.
I haven\'t yet used the new hammer that you gave me.
Tom is sitting in the garden, reading the newspaper.
Can\'t you see I\'m in the middle of something here?
I\'d like to know why you didn\'t just wait for Tom.
I\'m pretty sure that Tom won\'t cancel the meeting.
I didn\'t know how to tell Tom I didn\'t want to go.
I didn\'t know what I\'d done was against the rules.
It might be kind of fun going to the beach with Tom.
It never occurred to me that Tom might not eat meat.
It\'ll be difficult to glue the two pieces together.
